history.proof: intros contra. qsimpl time: 1 use: Dec,ReflectF. qsimpl time: 1 use: Dec,ReflectF. qsimpl time: 1 use: Dec_true,Dec,ReflectF. hauto dep: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment P : Prop H : dec P contra : Dec P = false The term "P" has type "Prop" while it is expected to have type "reflect ?P ?b".

In environment X0 : forall P : Prop, (P -> False) -> reflect P false X : forall X : Prop, dec X -> dec X P : Prop H : dec P contra : Dec P = false H0 : P Unable to unify "reflect ?M1568 false" with "False".

In environment X2 : forall P : Prop, (P -> False) -> reflect P false X1 : forall X : Prop, dec X -> dec X X0 : forall P : Prop, (P -> False) -> reflect P false X : forall X : Prop, dec X -> dec X P : Prop H : dec P contra : Dec P = false H0 : P Unable to unify "P" with "False".

original: intros contra. apply (ssrbool.elimF P (Dec P) (ReflectF _ _) contra). apply ReflectF. intro HP. apply Dec_true with (Dec P); [reflexivity|apply HP].
